name: Mouse Liver in Bmal1 KO and WT
description: RNA-Seq of mouse (C57BL/6) liver in either a Bmal1 clock-knockout model (either post-natal or pre-natal) and wildtype. Post-natal knock-out was sequenced under constant-darkness conditions. Prenatal knock-out was sequenced under 12-hour light-dark cycles.

name: Mouse Liver with Adipocyte-specific Bmal1 KO
description: RNA-Seq of mouse (C57BL/6) liver under dark-dark conditions in either wild-type mice or mice with a Bmal1 adipocyte-specific clock KO.

entries.name: WT vs KO
entries.description: Mouse Liver RNA-seq under adipocyte-specific clock knock-out

name: Inverted Feeding Schedules in Mice - GSE150385
description: RNA-Seq of mouse (C57BL/6J) peripheral tissues under 12h light:12h dark conditions under either a daytime-restricted feeding (DRF) or a nighttime-restricted feeding (NRF) for 7 days.

name: Mouse Pancreas under Chronic Phase Shift
description: RNA-Seq of mouse (C57Bl/6J) pancreas under 12h:12h light/dark conditions (CircNorm) or with the light-dark cycle advanced 8 hours every 2-3 days for 4 weeks (CircDis), in male and female mice.

entries.name: Female CircDis vs CircNorm
entries.description: Disrupted and normal circadian conditions in female mice

entries.name: Male CircDis vs CircNorm
entries.description: Disrupted and normal circadian conditions in male mice
